name.ja: シャイニーシェイディー

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster during their turn, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Change up to 2 face-up Effect Monsters on the field to face-down Defense Position. Then, if you changed to face-down Defense Position a monster with 2600 or more original ATK on your opponent's field, gain 1500 LP.
